block.p: Hilary Buell Sweeny, a daughter of Mr. and Mrs. Bradley P. Sweeny of Rye, N.Y., was married on Friday to Jan Karst, a son of Dr. Edith Karst of Cologne, Germany, and the late Carl Karst. The Rev. Edward Johnston performed the ceremony at St. Paul's Episcopal Church in Nantucket, Mass.

Mrs. Karst is the senior marketing manager at Spears, Benzak, Salomon & Farrell, an asset management firm in New York. She graduated from Roanoke College. Her father is the executive vice president of Dominick & Dominick, an investment banking concern in New York.

Hilary Buell Sweeny, a daughter of Mr. and Mrs. Bradley P. Sweeny of Rye, N.Y., was married on Friday to Jan Karst, a son of Dr. Edith Karst of Cologne, Germany, and the late Carl Karst. The Rev. Edward Johnston performed the ceremony at St. Paul's Episcopal Church in Nantucket, Mass.

Mrs. Karst is the senior marketing manager at Spears, Benzak, Salomon & Farrell, an asset management firm in New York. She graduated from Roanoke College. Her father is the executive vice president of Dominick & Dominick, an investment banking concern in New York.

Mr. Karst is a director of new business development at W. P. Carey International, a real estate investment bank in New York. He graduated from Colorado College and received an M.B.A. from Duke University. His mother retired as the chairwoman of the Cologne Wallpaper Manufacturing Company, of which the bridegroom's father had been chairman.
